name: Tex Mex Stir Fry
author: draynivl
summary: My husband calls it Mexican Chinese food.  Chicken is stir fried with bell peppers, black beans, and salsa.  It's delicious served with rice and topped with cheese.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, or as needed
1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into bite size pieces
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Heat 1 teaspoon of olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat until the oil is very hot, and cook and stir the green and red bell pepper until they are starting to become tender, about 5 minutes
Mix flour and   in a bowl, and stir in chicken pieces, a few at a time, to thoroughly coat with the flour mixture
Heat 2 teaspoons of olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat, and cook and stir the chicken until no longer pink and the coating is browned, about 5 minutes
Stir in the bell peppers, black beans, and salsa, and let the mixture simmer for about 5 minutes to blend the flavors
To serve, sprinkle each portion with Cheddar cheese
